Review Name: Super! Review Description: If you give a damn about looks, then it can't get any better than this AC. Search for your WINDOW NON INVERTER AC 1.5 ton should end here. Cooling is fantabulous. I keep the door of my bedroom open and it cools my kitchen as well. Voltas guys , if you are reading this , 2 star for ergonomics and looks, 5 star for every thing else.
